languages.text:
Cybermastiff moves to an enemy in a straight line, passing through other units and ignoring AoO on the way, then attacks, applying {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}Tagged{/g}.
Can't be used against targets {g|f:1a0ecfe6f6e54d3e9418f4112ec3cc72}Tagged{/g} by other Cybermastiffs. Minimum usage distance is 2 cells.
